Steve Hofmeyr (a mụrụ na 29 Ọgọst 1964) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV na South Africa.
Ọ bụkwa onye egwu South Africa kacha baa ọgaranya.
Hofmeyr lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Natasha Sutherland, onye ọ zutere na setịpụ Egoli: Place of Gold n'afọ 1998
Hofmeyr nwekwara ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ site na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ. Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe akụkọ banyere ọtụtụ ihe na-emetụta oge Hofmeyr n'ihe ngosi n'afọ 2008.

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2008, Hofmeyr kwuru na ọ wakporo Esmaré Weideman, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Huisgenoot, magazin Afrikaans a ma ama, site n'ịwụsa ya iko tii oyi na ngwụcha nke Miss South Africa. A sịrị na ọ boro ya na ndị nta akụkọ abụọ ndị ọzọ ụta maka ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Sutherland
Miss Weideman mechara wepụ ebubo mwakpo ya.
N'abalị 19 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, e jidere Hofmeyr na Bronkhorstspruit maka ịkwọ ụgbọala na 169 km / h na mpaghara 80 km / h ma hapụ ya na mgbapụta nke R500
E mechara kwụọ ya R10,000 n'ụlọ ikpe Bronkhorstspruit na 23 Jenụwarị 2014.
Hofmeyr lụrụ Janine van der Vyver na 26 Jenụwarị 2014
N'afọ 2008, van der Vyver, onye nkuzi ahụike, kpughere na ha anọwo na-ahụ ibe ha kemgbe afọ iri. A mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị, Romy Lee, na 19 June afọ 2017.
Nna nna Hofmeyr, Steve Hofmeyr Sr., bụ onye ndu na Ossewabrandwag.
Hofmyer bụkwa Onye Kraịst kwusiri ike ma jee ozi afọ abụọ iwu kwadoro nke ọrụ agha achọrọ na South Africa n'oge ahụ.
